phases.name: SDK Foundation & Core Infrastructure
phases.description: Set up Rust project structure, core client, types, and authentication

phases.name: Info Endpoints Implementation
phases.description: Implement all read-only info endpoints for market data and user queries

phases.name: Demo Website
phases.description: Build Bloomberg-style white theme dashboard to demonstrate all API calls

userStories.title: Initialize Rust project with Cargo
acceptanceCriteria: Cargo.toml with required dependencies (reqwest, tokio, serde, serde_json, thiserror, ethers)
Basic module structure created (lib.rs, client.rs, types.rs, error.rs)
userStories.notes: Completed: Cargo.toml created with all dependencies, basic module structure (lib.rs, client.rs, types.rs, error.rs) implemented with unit tests.

userStories.title: Define core types and models
acceptanceCriteria: Request/Response structs for all endpoints with Serde derive
Enum types for TimeInForce, OrderType, etc.
userStories.notes: Completed: Comprehensive type definitions for all Info and Exchange endpoints. Includes 29 unit tests for serialization/deserialization covering enums, request structs, and response types.

userStories.title: Implement error handling module
acceptanceCriteria: Error variants for HTTP, parsing, authentication, API errors
userStories.notes: Completed: Custom Error enum with Http, Json, Api, Auth, InvalidParameter, and WebSocket variants. Result type alias defined. Comprehensive unit tests for all error conversions and Display implementations.

userStories.title: Implement HTTP client wrapper
acceptanceCriteria: POST request helper for /info and /exchange endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: Async HTTP client with post_info() and post_exchange() methods. Response parsing handles HTTP errors, API error responses, and JSON parsing failures. Includes 10 comprehensive mocked tests using mockito.

userStories.title: Implement EIP-712 signing for authentication
userStories.notes: Completed: Wallet struct with from_private_key() and from_bytes() constructors. Nonce generation via generate_nonce() returning millisecond timestamps. EIP-712 signing using phantom agent construction with domain (Exchange, v1, chainId 1337). Signature formatting as {r, s, v} JSON. 14 unit tests covering wallet creation, nonce generation, connection ID computation, signing for mainnet/testnet, vault addresses, and serialization.

userStories.title: Implement Perpetuals metadata endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: Info module with perpetuals metadata endpoints. perp_dexs(), meta(dex?), meta_and_asset_ctxs(dex?), and all_perp_metas() methods implemented as Client extensions. 13 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, optional dex parameter, and error handling.

userStories.title: Implement Spot metadata endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: Spot module with all metadata endpoints. spot_meta(), spot_meta_and_asset_ctxs(), token_details(tokenId), spot_deploy_state(user), and spot_pair_deploy_auction_status() methods implemented as Client extensions. Added SpotAssetCtx, TokenDetails, SpotDeployState, and SpotPairAuctionStatus response types. 17 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints and error handling.

userStories.title: Implement market data endpoints
acceptanceCriteria: l2Book(coin, nSigFigs?, aggregationLevel?) - order book snapshot
candle(coin, interval, startTime, endTime?) - OHLCV candles
userStories.notes: Completed: Market data module with all_mids(dex?), l2_book(coin, n_sig_figs?, mantissa?), and candle(coin, interval, start_time, end_time?) methods implemented as Client extensions. 22 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, optional parameters, empty responses, and error handling.

userStories.title: Implement user clearinghouse state endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: User clearinghouse state module with clearinghouse_state(user, dex?) and spot_clearinghouse_state(user) methods implemented as Client extensions. 12 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, optional dex parameter, multiple positions, empty balances, and error handling.

userStories.title: Implement user orders endpoints
acceptanceCriteria: frontendOpenOrders(user, dex?) - orders with frontend info
orderStatus(user, oid | cloid) - query order by ID
userStories.notes: Completed: Orders info module with open_orders(user, dex?), frontend_open_orders(user, dex?), historical_orders(user), and order_status(user, oid) methods implemented as Client extensions. Added HistoricalOrder response type. 22 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, optional dex parameter, order ID types (oid/cloid), and error handling.

userStories.title: Implement user fills endpoints
acceptanceCriteria: userFillsByTime(user, startTime, endTime?) - fills by time range
userStories.notes: Completed: Fills module with user_fills(user, dex?), user_fills_by_time(user, start_time, end_time?), and user_twap_slice_fills(user) methods implemented as Client extensions. Added TwapSliceFill response type. 21 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, optional parameters, and error handling.

userStories.title: Implement funding endpoints
acceptanceCriteria: userFunding(user, startTime, endTime?) - user funding history
userStories.notes: Completed: Funding module with user_funding(user, start_time, end_time?), funding_history(coin, start_time, end_time?), and predicted_fundings() methods implemented as Client extensions. 16 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, optional parameters, empty responses, and error handling.

userStories.title: Implement user account info endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: Account module with user_non_funding_ledger_updates(user, start_time, end_time?), rate_limits(user), portfolio(user), user_fees(user), user_role(user), and subaccounts(user) methods implemented as Client extensions. Added LedgerUpdate, LedgerDelta, RateLimitInfo, Portfolio, FeeSchedule, UserFees, DailyUserVlm, UserRole, and Subaccount response types. 19 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, optional parameters, and error handling.

userStories.title: Implement staking info endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: Staking module with staking_delegations(user), staking_summary(user), staking_history(user), and staking_rewards(user) methods implemented as Client extensions. Added StakingDelegation, StakingSummary, StakingHistoryEntry, and StakingReward response types. 18 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints and error handling.

userStories.title: Implement vault and misc info endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: Vault module with 10 info endpoints implemented as Client extensions. Added response types VaultDetails, UserVaultDeposit, BuilderFeeApprovalInfo, ReferralInfo, Hip3State, PerpDexStatus. 45 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, optional parameters, and error handling.

userStories.title: Implement borrow/lend info endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: Borrow/lend module with borrow_lend_user_state(user), borrow_lend_reserve_state(coin), all_borrow_lend_reserve_states(), and aligned_quote_token(coin) methods implemented as Client extensions. Added BorrowLendUserState, BorrowLendPosition, BorrowLendReserveState, and AlignedQuoteToken response types. 23 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints and error handling.

userStories.title: Implement order placement endpoints
acceptanceCriteria: Supports all TimeInForce options (GTC, IOC, ALO)
Unit tests with mocked exchange responses
userStories.notes: Completed: Exchange module with place_order() and place_batch_orders() methods implemented as Client extensions. LimitOrderBuilder and TriggerOrderBuilder for ergonomic order construction. Supports all TimeInForce options (GTC, IOC, ALO), trigger orders (stop loss, take profit), reduce_only, client_order_id, and vault trading. 28 unit tests with mocked responses covering all order types, batch orders, partial success, and error handling.

userStories.title: Implement order cancellation endpoints
acceptanceCriteria: cancelOrder(asset, oid) - cancel by order ID
cancelOrderByCloid(asset, cloid) - cancel by client ID
userStories.notes: Completed: Cancel module with cancel_order(), cancel_order_by_cloid(), cancel_batch_orders(), and cancel_batch_orders_by_cloid() methods implemented as Client extensions. All methods support optional vault_address for vault trading. 22 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, batch operations, partial success scenarios, and error handling.

userStories.title: Implement order modification endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: Modify module with modify_order() and modify_batch_orders() methods implemented as Client extensions. ModifyOrderBuilder and ModifyTriggerOrderBuilder for ergonomic order modification. All methods support optional vault_address for vault trading. 22 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, batch operations, partial success scenarios, and error handling.

userStories.title: Implement TWAP order endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: TWAP module with place_twap_order() and cancel_twap_order() methods implemented as Client extensions. Both methods support optional vault_address and reduce_only options. Helper functions is_twap_running(), get_twap_id(), and get_twap_error() for response handling. 22 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, validation, error handling, and wallet signing.

userStories.title: Implement schedule cancel (dead man's switch)
acceptanceCriteria: Validates timestamp is >= 5 seconds in future
userStories.notes: Completed: Schedule cancel (dead man's switch) module with schedule_cancel() and schedule_cancel_with_options() methods implemented as Client extensions. Validates timestamp is at least 5 seconds in the future. Helper functions is_schedule_cancel_successful() and get_scheduled_time() for response handling. 18 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, validation, error handling, and wallet signing.

userStories.title: Implement leverage and margin endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: Leverage module with update_leverage() and update_isolated_margin() methods implemented as Client extensions. Both methods support optional vault_address for vault trading. Helper functions is_leverage_update_successful() and get_updated_leverage() for response handling. 27 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, validation, error handling, and wallet signing.

userStories.title: Implement transfer endpoints
acceptanceCriteria: spotTransfer(destination, token, amount) - spot token transfer
userStories.notes: Completed: Transfer module with usd_transfer(), spot_transfer(), send_asset(), withdraw(), and spot_perp_transfer() methods implemented as Client extensions. All methods support optional vault_address for vault trading. Helper functions is_transfer_successful() and get_transfer_hash() for response handling. 35 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, validation, error handling, and wallet signing.

userStories.title: Implement staking action endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: Staking action module with stake_deposit(), stake_withdraw(), delegate(), and undelegate() methods implemented as Client extensions. Helper functions is_staking_successful() and get_staking_hash() for response handling. 31 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, validation, error handling, and wallet signing.

userStories.title: Implement vault action endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: Vault module with vault_deposit() and vault_withdraw() methods implemented as Client extensions. Helper functions is_vault_action_successful() and get_vault_hash() for response handling. 28 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, validation, error handling, and wallet signing.

userStories.title: Implement wallet and builder approval endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: Approval module with approve_agent() and approve_builder_fee() methods implemented as Client extensions. Both methods support mainnet/testnet chain configuration. Helper functions is_approval_successful() and get_approval_hash() for response handling. 29 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, validation, error handling, and wallet signing.

userStories.title: Implement misc exchange endpoints
userStories.notes: Completed: Misc module with reserve_request_weight(), noop(), and set_hip3_enabled() methods implemented as Client extensions. Helper functions is_misc_successful() and get_misc_hash() for response handling. 28 unit tests with mocked responses covering all endpoints, validation, error handling, and wallet signing.

userStories.title: Implement WebSocket client foundation
userStories.notes: Completed: WsClient with connect(), disconnect(), close() methods. Connection states: Disconnected, Connecting, Connected, Reconnecting, Closed. ReconnectConfig with exponential backoff (configurable initial delay, max delay, multiplier, max attempts). Heartbeat task sends periodic pings, reader task handles pong responses. send_text(), send_json(), send_binary(), recv(), try_recv() methods. State subscription via watch channel. 38 unit tests covering all functionality.

userStories.title: Implement subscription management
userStories.notes: Completed: Subscription enum with 19 subscription types (allMids, l2Book, trades, candle, bbo, activeAssetCtx, notification, webData3, twapStates, clearinghouseState, openOrders, orderUpdates, userEvents, userFills, userFundings, userNonFundingLedgerUpdates, activeAssetData, userTwapSliceFills, userTwapHistory). SubscriptionRequest for message formatting with subscribe/unsubscribe methods. SubscriptionManager for state tracking (pending, active, unsubscribing). ChannelMessage for parsing incoming messages. WsClient methods: subscribe(), unsubscribe(), resubscribe_all(), unsubscribe_all(), clear_subscriptions(). 87 unit tests with comprehensive coverage.

userStories.title: Implement market data subscriptions
userStories.notes: Completed: WsClient convenience methods for market data subscriptions. subscribe_all_mids(), subscribe_all_mids_with_dex(dex), subscribe_l2_book(coin), subscribe_l2_book_with_params(coin, n_sig_figs?, mantissa?), subscribe_trades(coin), subscribe_candle(coin, interval), subscribe_bbo(coin), and subscribe_active_asset_ctx(coin) methods implemented. 38 unit tests covering not-connected errors, subscription creation, JSON serialization, and integration tests (marked with #[ignore]).

userStories.title: Implement user data subscriptions
userStories.notes: Completed: WsClient convenience methods for user data subscriptions. subscribe_notification(user), subscribe_web_data3(user), subscribe_twap_states(user), subscribe_twap_states_with_dex(user, dex), subscribe_clearinghouse_state(user), subscribe_clearinghouse_state_with_dex(user, dex), subscribe_open_orders(user), and subscribe_open_orders_with_dex(user, dex) methods implemented. 38 unit tests covering not-connected errors, subscription creation, JSON serialization, and integration tests (marked with #[ignore]).

userStories.title: Implement user event subscriptions
userStories.notes: Completed: WsClient convenience methods for user event subscriptions. subscribe_order_updates(user), subscribe_user_events(user), subscribe_user_fills(user), subscribe_user_fills_with_aggregation(user, aggregate_by_time), subscribe_user_fundings(user), subscribe_user_non_funding_ledger_updates(user), subscribe_active_asset_data(user, coin), subscribe_user_twap_slice_fills(user), and subscribe_user_twap_history(user) methods implemented. 36 unit tests covering not-connected errors, subscription creation, JSON serialization, and integration tests (marked with #[ignore]).

userStories.title: Set up web project with Rust backend
userStories.notes: Completed: Axum 0.7 web server with tower-http middleware. CORS configured to allow any origin for demo purposes. SDK Client integrated in AppState with sample /api/info/perp-dexs and /api/info/meta endpoints. Static file serving from /static directory with index.html. Bloomberg-style white theme frontend with monospace fonts, clean borders, and professional dashboard aesthetic. Run with: cargo run --bin demo-server --features demo

userStories.title: Create API endpoints for SDK functions
acceptanceCriteria: REST endpoints wrapping each SDK info function
REST endpoints wrapping each SDK exchange function
userStories.notes: Completed: Comprehensive REST API endpoints implemented. Info endpoints (40+): perpetuals metadata, spot metadata, market data (mids, l2-book, candles), user state (clearinghouse, orders, fills, funding), account info (rate limits, portfolio, fees, subaccounts), staking, vaults, borrow-lend. Exchange endpoints (25+): order placement/cancel/modify, TWAP orders, leverage/margin updates, transfers (USDC, spot, withdraw, spot-perp), staking (deposit, withdraw, delegate, undelegate), vault deposit/withdraw, agent/builder approvals, misc (reserve weight, noop, hip3). WebSocket proxy at /ws forwards to Hyperliquid upstream. Standard ApiResponse wrapper with success/error format. All endpoints return proper JSON with error handling.

userStories.title: Design Bloomberg-style white theme UI
acceptanceCriteria: Clean white background with minimal borders
Responsive layout for different screen sizes
userStories.notes: Completed: Bloomberg-inspired dashboard with CSS custom properties for colors, spacing, and typography. Clean white background with minimal borders. Monospace fonts (SF Mono, Monaco, Inconsolata). Professional financial aesthetic with panels, data tables, stat cards. Consistent 4px-48px spacing scale and 10px-24px typography hierarchy. Fully responsive with media queries at 1200px, 992px, 768px, 480px breakpoints.

userStories.title: Build Info Endpoints demo section
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar navigation for all info endpoints
JSON response display with syntax highlighting
userStories.notes: Completed: Comprehensive demo UI with 48 info endpoints organized in 10 sidebar categories. Dynamic input forms with required/optional field indicators and help text. JSON syntax highlighting using VS Code dark theme colors. Call Endpoint button with Ctrl+Enter shortcut. Loading spinner, error states, and response timing. Copy and format buttons.

userStories.title: Build Exchange Endpoints demo section
userStories.notes: Completed: 27 exchange endpoints organized in 7 sidebar categories (Orders, TWAP, Leverage, Transfers, Staking Actions, Vault Actions, Approvals & Misc). Security warning banner with private key warning. Form configurations with select dropdowns for booleans, type conversion for parameters. Success/error status indicators in response panel. Orange 'Execute Action' button styling. All endpoints connect to existing backend API.

userStories.title: Build WebSocket demo section
acceptanceCriteria: Subscription toggle buttons for each type
userStories.notes: Completed: Full WebSocket demo section with connection status indicator (disconnected/connecting/connected/error states with animated dots). 19 subscription types organized in 3 categories (Market Data: 6, User Data: 5, User Events: 8). Live data feed panel with collapsible JSON messages, syntax highlighting, and timestamps with milliseconds. Message history capped at 500 with newest-first display. Pause/resume functionality queues messages when paused. Clear button resets feed. Form inputs for coin/interval/user address. Active subscription tracking with visual indicators.

userStories.title: Final integration and testing
acceptanceCriteria: All SDK functions accessible from UI
userStories.notes: Completed: All 76 SDK functions accessible from demo UI (48 info, 27 exchange, 1 WebSocket demo). WebSocket connects directly to wss://api.hyperliquid.xyz/ws with 19 subscription types. Error handling with ApiResponse wrapper (success/error) in backend and visual error states in frontend. README.md documentation with quick start examples, API coverage tables, and demo instructions. All 730 unit tests passing (34 integration tests ignored as they require live server).
